author: ShitShowDevelopment
name: WaifuIM
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Use `[p]help <cog>` to get the list of commands and how to use them.
short: Get random waifu images and gifs.
description: Get random waifu images and gifs by tag using waifu.im api.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistantly store data or metadata about users.
